item.title: 1-Wire
item.description:
What is it?

Based on Wikipedia:

1-Wire is a wired half-duplex serial bus that provides low-speed (16.3 kbit/s) data communication and supply voltage over a single conductor. It’s similar in concept to I2C, but with lower data rates and longer range. It is typically used to communicate with small inexpensive devices such as digital thermometers and weather instruments.

Receive Data

At this moment, 1-Wire is not supported by Pi4J, but there is work-in-progress, see draft pull request #435.
